alert.note: Alert for Grant; La Salle (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:45PM CDT until October 12 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GRANT AND WEST CENTRAL LA SALLE PARISHES... At 544 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ball, or 8 miles north of Pineville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pollock, Fishville and Rogers. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
